page.title: 04LIFE ON OUR ESTATE
page.content: My{house}is on an estate.It is a quarter of the way around our{estate}. We live next to two houses. When you are in the back we have three neighbours.Our road is rough because they have been laid with loose chippings.We have a smooth drive and a big front garden and a small back garden.We are going to make a double garage on the side of our wall.Our grage door is blue. There are two hills on both sides of our estate. { By Alison Baker. Age 10. I live in Riverton Road.This is not an Estate.By my house there is a main road. I have lived there for five years.Across the road there is the {Village Hall,}a{Park }and a {Sports {field.}There is a{motorway}near by.The motorway is called the{M5. {By Rachel Simpson.Age 9.
